org.easybatch.xml

Class XmlWrapperTagWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.easybatch.xml.XmlWrapperTagWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JobEventListener

    public class XmlWrapperTagWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements JobEventListener
    Utility class to write an Xml declaration and a configurable wrapper tag to an output stream.
    Author:
    Mahmoud Ben Hassine (mahmoud@benhassine.fr)

        public void onJobException(java.lang.Throwable throwable)
        Description copied from interface: JobEventListener
